GeneralExplanationGrp.IdentifierTxt: AMENDED FOR CHANGE IN EXCESS DISTRIBUTIONS CARRYOVER
GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: THE ARMIN AND ESTHER HIRSCH FOUNDATION IS AMENDING THE FORM 990-PF TAX RETURN FOR THE FISCAL YEAR ENDED 12/31/21. THE TAXPAYER IS AMENDING PART XII DUE TO THE CHANGE IN EXCESS DISTRIBUTIONS CARRYOVER FROM 2020.
